events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 在显示/隐藏状态更改时触发;也被 v-model 使用

expanded-icon.description: Expand icon name (following Quasar convention) for when QExpansionItem is expanded; When used, it also disables the rotation animation of the expand icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix
expanded-icon.description_zh: 展开 QExpansionItem 时的图标名称（遵循 Quasar 约定）;使用时，它还会禁用展开图标的旋转动画;确保已安装图标库，除非使用 'img：' 前缀
expanded-icon.desc: Expand icon name (following Quasar convention) for when QExpansionItem is expanded; When used, it also disables the rotation animation of the expand icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

expand-icon-class.description: Apply custom class(es) to the expand icon item section
expand-icon-class.description_zh: 将自定义类应用于展开图标项部分

toggle-aria-label.description: aria-label to be used on the expansion toggle element
toggle-aria-label.description_zh: aria-label 用于扩展切换元素

label.description_zh: 标题标签（除非使用 'header' 插槽）

label-lines.description: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!
label-lines.description_zh: 当没有足够的空间在指定的行数上呈现时，应用省略号;如果指定了多行，那么它只能在 webkit 浏览器上运行，因为它使用了 '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS 属性！

caption.description_zh: Header 子标签（除非使用 'header' 插槽）

caption-lines.description: Apply ellipsis when there's not enough space to render on the specified number of lines; If more than one line specified, then it will only work on webkit browsers because it uses the '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS property!
caption-lines.description_zh: 当没有足够的空间在指定的行数上呈现时，应用省略号;如果指定了多行，那么它只能在 webkit 浏览器上运行，因为它使用了 '-webkit-line-clamp' CSS 属性！

duration.description_zh: 动画持续时间（以毫秒为单位）

header-inset-level.description: Apply an inset to header (unless using 'header' slot); Useful when header avatar/left side is missing but you want to align content with other items that do have a left side, or when you're building a menu
header-inset-level.description_zh: 将 inset 应用于 header （除非使用 'header' 插槽）;当缺少标题头像/左侧，但您希望将内容与具有左侧的其他项目对齐时，或者当您正在构建菜单时，这很有用

content-inset-level.description: Apply an inset to content (changes content padding)
content-inset-level.description_zh: 将插入应用于内容（更改内容填充）

expand-separator.description: Apply a top and bottom separator when expansion item is opened
expand-separator.description_zh: 打开扩展项时应用顶部和底部分隔符

default-opened.description: Puts expansion item into open state on initial render; Overridden by v-model if used
default-opened.description_zh: 在初始渲染时将扩展项置于打开状态;如果使用，则被 v-model 覆盖

hide-expand-icon.description: Do not show the expand icon

expand-icon-toggle.description: Applies the expansion events to the expand icon only and not to the whole header
expand-icon-toggle.description_zh: 仅将扩展事件应用于展开图标，而不应用于整个标题

switch-toggle-side.description: Switch expand icon side (from default 'right' to 'left')
switch-toggle-side.description_zh: 切换展开图标侧（从默认的 'right' 到 'left'）

dense-toggle.description: Use dense mode for expand icon
dense-toggle.description_zh: 对展开图标使用密集模式

group.description: Register expansion item into a group (unique name that must be applied to all expansion items in that group) for coordinated open/close state within the group a.k.a. 'accordion mode'
group.description_zh: 将扩展项注册到一个组中（必须应用于该组中所有扩展项的唯一名称），以便在组内（也称为“折叠模式”）中协调打开/关闭状态

popup.description_zh: 将扩展列表置于“弹出”模式

header-style.description: Apply custom style to the header
header-style.description_zh: 将自定义样式应用于页眉

header-class.description: Apply custom class(es) to the header
header-class.description_zh: 将自定义类应用于标头

v-model.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 定义显示/隐藏状态的组件模型;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令

to.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'to' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used
to.description_zh: 等同于 Vue Router <router-link> 的 'to' 属性;如果使用，则被 'href' prop 取代

exact.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'exact' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used
exact.description_zh: 等价于 Vue Router <router-link> 的 'exact' 属性;如果使用，则被 'href' prop 取代

replace.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'replace' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used
replace.description_zh: 相当于 Vue Router <router-link> 的 'replace' 属性;如果使用，则被 'href' prop 取代

active-class.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used
active-class.description_zh: 等同于 Vue Router <router-link> 的 'active-class' 属性;如果使用，则被 'href' prop 取代

exact-active-class.description: Equivalent to Vue Router <router-link> 'active-class' property; Superseded by 'href' prop if used
exact-active-class.description_zh: 等同于 Vue Router <router-link> 的 'active-class' 属性;如果使用，则被 'href' prop 取代

href.description: Native <a> link href attribute; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props
href.description_zh: 原生<a>链接 href 属性;优先于 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' 属性

target.description: Native <a> link target attribute; Use it only along with 'href' prop; Has priority over the 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' props
target.description_zh: Native <a> link 目标属性;只能与 'href' prop 一起使用;优先于 'to'/'exact'/'replace'/'active-class'/'exact-active-class' 属性

slots.name: default
slots.description: Slot used for expansion item's content
slots.description_zh: 用于扩展项内容的插槽

slots.name: header
slots.description: Slot used for overriding default header
slots.description_zh: 用于覆盖默认标头的插槽
